sections: will be hosting a subscriber-only live chat with Sirota, Dr. Cornel West and The Nation’s John Nichols. We will discuss the 2020 election and the future of progressive politics in America. Read Dr. West's recent interview in Jacobin magazine

These events are exclusively for Daily Poster subscribers, who will be able to watch the broadcasts live and ask questions in real time. Please register for the event ahead of time at the Crowdcast link below — and you can start posting your questions in the chat room right now!
The live chat with Dr. West will take place on 12/9 from 7:30pm to 8:30pm ET (4:30pm-5:30pm PST).
To participate, subscribers should go to this link: https://www.crowdcast.io/e/daily-poster-live-chat
• Go to the event link and register for the event right now so that you don’t have to deal with login/registration issues at the time of the event.
• Copy and paste the event URL into your browser and copy and paste the event password in. The event URL is: https://www.crowdcast.io/e/daily-poster-live-chat
• If possible, please try to use a regular desktop or laptop computer, and use the Chrome browser. You can read more about browser compatibility
• If you want to participate using an iPhone or iPad, you can download Crowdcast’s app

• If you are connected to the live broadcast and have connectivity issues, you should refresh your browser; hit "Help" at the top of the screen (which enters you into compatibility mode); and click the settings cog icon on the bottom right corner and switch to 360p resolution.
